name: Dashy Bird
description:
This is a game for the Unexpected Game Jam. You play Flappy Bird but with a catch. you don't have to be concentrated the whole time because the bird holds himself in the air. You just have to help him out when he wants to go through the gap.

This game is played just with the left mouse button. That also means it can be played on mobile if you request the desktop version of the website.

Thanks to my friend who made the graphics for this game.
